thread.title: France offers citizenship to Malian immigrant who scaled building to rescue child

title: France offers citizenship to Malian immigrant who scaled building to rescue child
text:
France offers citizenship to Malian immigrant who scaled building to rescue child 10:23am IST - 01:21
France on Monday offered citizenship to an illegal immigrant from Mali who scaled the facade of a Paris apartment block to save a boy who was about to fall from a fourth-floor balcony, President Emmanuel Macron said. Chris Dignam reports.
France on Monday offered citizenship to an illegal immigrant from Mali who scaled the facade of a Paris apartment block to save a boy who was about to fall from a fourth-floor balcony, President Emmanuel Macron said. Chris Dignam reports. //reut.rs/2ITuZgD
